member.name: P:Jmelosegui.DevOps.Client.IdentityListRequest.QueryMembership
member.summary: Gets or sets QueryMembership. The membership information to include with the identities. Values can be None for no membership data or Direct to include the groups that the identity is a member of and the identities that are a member of this identity (groups only).

member.summary: Gets or sets IdentityIds. A comma seperated list of storage keys to resolve.

member.name: P:Jmelosegui.DevOps.Client.IdentityListRequest.SearchFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of search to perform. Values can be AccountName (domain\alias), DisplayName, MailAddress, General (display name, account name, or unique name), or LocalGroupName (only search Azure Devops groups).
